{{also|februar|febrúar|február|februār}} ==Ewe== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|ee|/ˈfɛbɹʊʌɹ/}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|ee|proper nouns}} # [[February]] ====Related terms==== * {{l|ee|Dzodze}} [[Category:ee:Months]] ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|Feber||Austria|dated}} ===Etymology=== {{rfe|de}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfeːbruaːr/|[ˈfeː.bʁu.aːɐ̯]}} {{qualifier|standard}} * {{IPA|de|[ˈfeː.bʁʊɐ̯]}} {{qualifier|casual speech}} * {{audio|de|De-Februar.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Februars|gen2=Februar|Februare}} # {{l|en|February}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(s)|e}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|February}} {{l|de|Hornung}} {{qualifier|archaic or poetic}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|et|veebruar}} * {{desc|bor=1|lb|Februar}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} {{topics|de|Months}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{der|lb|de|Februar}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈfeːbʀuˌaː(ʀ)/|[ˈfeːbʀuˌaː(χ)]}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|lb|proper noun}} # [[February]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/lb}} ---- ==Scots== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|sco|enm|Februarie}}, {{m|enm|februari}}, {{m|enm|februare}}, from {{der|sco|la|Februārius||the [[month]] of the [[Februa]]}}, from {{m|la|Fēbrua||the [[purging|Purging]]s, the [[purification|Purification]]s}}, a Roman holiday two days after its [[ides]] (i.e., Feb. 15), + {{m|la|-arius||[[-ary]]: ''[[form]]ing [[adjective]]s''}}. {{m|la|Fēbrua}} from {{m|la|fēbruum||[[purging]]}}, from an earlier {{der|sco|sbv}} word, possibly from {{der|sco|ine-pro|*dʰewh₂-||[[smoke]], [[haze]]}} and thus cognate with {{m|en|thio-||[[sulfurous]]}} and {{der|en|grc|θεῖον||[[sulfur]]}} or from {{der|sco|ine-pro|*dʰegʷʰris}}, an extension of the root {{m|ine-pro|*dʰegʷʰ-|gloss=to [[burn]]}} and thus cognate with {{m|en|fever}} and {{m|la|febris}}. A relatinization abandoning {{der|en|enm|feoverel}}, from {{der|en|fro|feverier}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|sco|[ˈfɛbruər]}} ===Proper noun=== {{sco-proper noun}} # [[February]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/sco}} [[Category:sco:Months]]
